description:
Many of you asked for more girl/girl shoots. I'm glad you did. This is one of the hottest shoots in a while.
These two beautiful, sexy women asked me one day if they could play together for a WB shoot. Of course I didn't turn them down. Why would I want to? I knew they knew each other well and the shoot proves that fact. Thanks for asking Isis and Satine and all you girl/girl shoot lovers! As a side note I wanted to let everyone know that in scene one, due to a camera problem we were unable to use the footage of the last two orgasms. The two girls fucking in mid air scene was alot longer but we lost some of the footage. You WILL be seeing that scene redone! Just so you know.
title: Isis Love and Satine Phoenix
